text: Deadly Happy is the third studio album by Andreas Johnson. It was released on 11 February 2002. ==Track listing== # "Shine" - 3.42 # "End of the World" - 4.15 # "Waterfall" - 4.19 # "The Greatest Day" - 3.56 # "Brand New Thing" - 2.50 # "Spirit of You" - 3.46 # "Great Undying Love" - 4.37 # "Deadly Happy" - 2.57 # "The Pretty Ones" - 3.13 # "This Time" - 3.13 # "Make Me Beautiful" - 3.53 # "My Love (Song for a Butterfly)" - 3.35 # "Starcrossed" - 3.46 ==Charts== {| class="wikitable" !align="left"|Chart (2002) !align="center"|Peak position |- |align="left"|Sweden |align="center"|45 |} == References == ==External links== Category:2002 albums Category:Andreas Johnson albums
title: Deadly Happy
